titles.title: On the passing of Joseph Robinette Biden, III.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: 6/4/2015--Introduced. Expresses the profound sorrow and deep regret of the House of Representatives on the announcement of the untimely death of Joseph Robinette "Beau" Biden, III, son of Vice President Joseph Robinette Biden, Jr.
